channel.title: Hyperion Perfect Combat Development
channel.description:
[center]So I was pretty bored at the moment, waiting for someone to do something for my 484, and now the Minecraft server is off, I'm going to start working on a Hyperion project. The goal is to create "perfect" [not literally perfect (as impossible), but extremely close-to] combat on the server, then release it after wards. This project is dedicated to Graham for his amazing frameworks, friendliness, and innovation.
Another inspiration for this project was my previous project, "iServer". It had decent enough combat, which a lot of people loved, however was NOT a clean and well-done server.
This project will be completely free for modification and use.
[b]Downloads[/b]
Revision 0.1 : Includes simple combat structure, region system, first release Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.1.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?2sc9112879b83kc
Revision 0.15 : Fixed previous errors, added distance checking, removed Brett's ugly enumeration Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.15.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?950r9p27ugi5b8u
Revision 0.2 : Added basic accuracy formula, base for special attacks, started ranging Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.2.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?1988hphap3c8fer
Revision 0.3: Improved range, 1-click combat start (run up to opponent then start attacking), weapon switch queuing (no overlapping emotes in combat), attributes system, started magic Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.3.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?iv7skis8vklmb80
Revision 0.4: Worked on magic a whole lot! Checks to see which combat type you are using. Range patch. Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.4.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?88ny8erfhbcfazg
Revision 0.45: No more defence emote overlapping attack anim. Some more magic features. Started skills. Link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/Hyperion/hyperion_combat_r0.45.zip Mirror: http://www.mediafire.com/?ntbng1bg937tgsq

item.title: Hyperion Perfect Combat Development
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:6, topic:378253”]Ok well I need help with the formula’s mainly. The actual look I’ve pretty much perfected.

Melee max hit I’ve got perfect
Ranged max hit I’ve got decent

I need help with ranged accuracy, and even more help with magic accuracy[/quote]

This is both the melee and ranged accuracy calculation (according to runescape.wikia.com), and it’s pretty much perfect.

double chance = 0.515 * (ATTACK_BONUS / TARGET_DEFENCE_BONUS); if (chance > new Random().nextDouble()) { // Hit through target's defence. }

The ATTACK_BONUS and TARGET_DEFENCE_BONUS aren’t just the equipment bonuses, they’re calculated as well. I’m sure you know of/have these?

As for the magic accurary, I’ve not come across any official formula or calculation, though I’ve used these for a while and they seem to be pretty accurate:

[code=java] private double getMagicAttack(Player player) {
final double ATTACK_LEVEL = player.getLevel(Constants.MAGIC);
final double MAGIC_ATTACK_BONUS = player.getEquipment().getBonus(Constants.BONUS_MAGIC_ATTACK);
double prayerBonus = 1;
double otherBonus = 1;

	if (player.getEquipment().isWearingVoidMage()) {
		otherBonus = 1.2;
	}
	if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_WILL)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.05;
	} else if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_LORE)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.1;
	} else if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_MIGHT)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.15;
	}
	return ((ATTACK_LEVEL + (MAGIC_ATTACK_BONUS * 2)) * prayerBonus) * otherBonus;
}

private double getMagicDefence(Player player) {
	final double MAGIC_DEFENCE_BONUS = player.getEquipment().getBonus(Constants.BONUS_MAGIC_DEFENCE);
	double defenceValue = (player.getLevel(Constants.DEFENCE) / 2) + (player.getLevel(Constants.MAGIC) / 2);
	double prayerBonus = 1;
	if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_WILL)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.05;
	} else if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_LORE)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.1;
	} else if (player.getPrayer().isUsingPrayer(Prayer.MYSTIC_MIGHT)) {
	    prayerBonus = 1.15;
	}
	return (defenceValue + (MAGIC_DEFENCE_BONUS * 1.5)) * prayerBonus);
}[/code]

Then you’d just use:

setSpellHitSuccess(random.nextInt(getMagicAttack()) > random.nextInt(getMagicDefence()) ? true : false);
